sentence: One of those Democrats was Senate candidate Alex Lasry of Wisconsin, who in a January commercial pledged to "stand up to China."
title: The Senate candidate who spotlights 'It is us versus China' in a new ad is a Democrat

sentence: Outagamie County Executive Tom Nelson has said China is eating our lunch,? when it comes to trade, while Milwaukee Bucks basketball team executive Alex Lasry vowed to stand up to China? in a TV ad.
author: Julia Manchester
title: Midwest Democrats go all in on tough-on-China approach
